narrative.narrative: Korean Air Cargo is the cargo division of Korean Air based at Incheon Airport. It's current fleet has 9 747-400F's, 8 747-400ERF's,5 747-8F's with 2 on order, and 4 777F's with 1 on order. It is the 5th largest cargo airline in the world in terms of freight tonne-kilometres as of 2012 with 8,144 million tonnes flown. They have flown many aircraft types over the years, A300's, 707's, 747-200's, and MD-11F's are part of their historical fleet.
